page.title: 03Shopping in Irvine.
page.content: In the past few years,{shopping}has changed very much. Shopping has become easier. Now there are self service shops unlike the old ones with an assistant. Now most of the shops are under cover. The{Mall}and the{Forum have these shops all under one roof. The shops have become bigger and sell many new things that would not have been available in Irvine before. New shops have been built and they make the towns and villages bigger. They sell things from food to plastic hardware, from plates and cups made of china to pets and animals.{Car parks are provided beside the shopping centre and one of these is also under cover. On a wet day it is possible to go by car and buy all the week's shopping without stepping outside and getting wet.
